Package src

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MouseClicked
    Interface extending MouseListener with four default empty methods to use it as ActionListener
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloseAction
    Notepad tab closing action
    ClosePanel
    Notepad tab component.
    FileMenu
    Notepad menu.
    FontChooser
    ComboBox with list of accessible font familys.
    FontColorChooser
    PopupMenu with font colors to set: red, blue, green, black.
    FontInfo
    A class with main info about font
    FontSizeChooser
    ComboBox with font size to set
    Log
    Notepad logger.
    NewButton
    Button to create a new empty document.
    NoteButton
    Default button for notepad menu
    NoteFrame
    Simple notepad with multiple tabs and extended font edition (color, size, font family).
    NoWrapParagraphView
    A ParagraphView for WrapEditorKit
    OpenAction
    Performs opening new document in notepad
    SaveAction
    Performs saving a document with a previously chosen path.
    SaveAsAction
    Performs saving action when no path is chosen yet
    SaveQuestionButton
    A button to be shown in SaveQuestionFrame
    SaveQuestionFrame
    A frame is shown when closing an unsaved document
    TabbedPane
    TabbedPane for a Notepad.
    TabInfo
    Contains the main info of a notepad tab to be sure in can be reopened
    TextArea
    A text element shown in every notepab tab.
    UndoRedo
    Manager for performing undo- and redo- actions to opened documents.
    UserData
    A manager for reading and saving user info about opened tabs after starting ang exiting a Notepad
    WrapColumnFactory
    A ViewFactory for WrapEditorKit
    WrapEditorKit
    A manager responsible for a proper text displaying
    WrapLabelView
    A LabelView for WrapEditorKit
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FontOptions
    An Enum used in TextArea.setFont()
